line.words: “Today, I want you to tell me about your favourite season,” says the children’s teacher, Mrs Adams. “Spring is in March, April and May. Who likes spring?”

subtitle.line: §Aujourd’hui, Je veux que vous me parliez de votre saison préférée.§ Dit la maîtresse, Madame Adams. §Le printemps est en mars, avril et mai. Qui aime le printemps ?§
“Hoy, quiero que me hables de tu estación del año favorita”, dice la maestra, la señorita Adams. “La primavera es en marzo, abril y mayo. ¿A quién le gusta la primavera?”

line.words: “I like spring,” says Sunita. “In spring it is warm and sunny. My favourite flowers are yellow daffodils and pink blossom. I also like chicks and lambs.”

subtitle.line: §J’aime le printemps§ Dit Sunita. §Au printemps il fait chaud et il fait soleil. Mes fleurs préférées sont les jonquilles jaunes et les bourgeons roses. J’aime aussi les poussins et les agneaux.§
“Me gusta la primavera”, dice Sunita. “En primavera hace calor y está soleado. Mis flores favoritas son los narcisos amarillos y las floras rosas. También me gustan los pollos y los corderos.”

line.words: “I also like spring,” says Peter. “I like Easter because I have lots of Easter eggs to eat. And the Easter bunny is fun!”

line.words: “Summer is in June, July and August. Who likes summer?” asks Mrs Adams.

line.words: “I like summer,” says Maria. “I am very excited because we visit my gran in Spain. It is very hot and sunny. The sky is blue and the flowers are purple.”

subtitle.line: §J’aime l’été.§ Dit Maria. §Je suis très excitée parce qu’on rend visite à ma mamie en Espagne. Il fait très chaud et il y a du soleil. Le ciel est bleu et les fleurs sont mauves.§
“Me gusta el verano”, dice María. “Es muy excitante porque visitamos a nuestra abuela en España. Hace mucho calor y está soleado. El cielo está azul y las flores son violetas”.

“मुझे ग्रीष्म ऋतु पसंद है,” मारिया कहती है। “मैं बहुत उत्साहित हूँ क्योंकि हम स्पेन में मेरी दादी से मिलने जाते हैं। उस समय बहुत गर्मी और धूप होती है। आकाश नीला होता है और बैंगनी रंग के फूल होते हैं।”

line.words: “I don’t have a favourite season, it was good weather in spring, but it was very rainy. It was sunny in summer, but it was very hot. It was quite good weather in autumn, but it was windy.§

subtitle.line: §Je n’ai pas de saison préférée.§ Dit Tom. §Il faisait bon au printemps mais c’était très pluvieux. Il a fait soleil en été, mais il faisait très chaud. Il faisait vraiment bon en automne mais il y avait du vent.

§Eu não tenho uma estação favorita§, diz Tom. §O tempo foi bom na primavera, mas foi muito chuvoso. Fez sol no verão, mas foi muito quente. O tempo estava muito bom no Outono, mas foi ventoso. E o tempo estava ruim no inverno, porque o céu estava cinzento e fez a muito frio.§
